title: DHS Dharmapuri Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 107 Staff Nurse Posts.
description: The District Health Society Dharmapuri (DHS Dharmapuri) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 107 Staff Nurse, Pharmacist, Driver, Cleaner, Health inspector, Lab Technician, Dental Surgeon, Multipurpose Hospital Worker Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their GNM, B.Sc Nursing, 10th pass, 12th, 8th, B. Pharm, D. Pharm, Any Degree, BDS, DMLT can...
